title: Cre4tures Volume 1: A collection of 6 unique Creature Voices
description: A collection of over 1200 audio files of words, phrases, and utterances from 6 Creatures (202 unique phrases for each Creature)
longDescription:
Audio Preview: SOUNDCLOUD


Creatures found in "Cre4tures: Volume 1" Included:

  1. Snork
  2. Scrowl
  3. Myewzeke
  4. Bux
  5. Spirow
  6. Brone


About the Voices:


Snork has a dark, demonic, deep and rich voice who's spoken English is somewhat unintelligible. Snork can sound terrifying at times but also has its soft spots and in fact is a bit of a baby on the inside. Nevertheless, you may choose to conceal this side and let Snork terrify as you wish.


Scrowl is a nasally, irritating, sneaky and deceptive bird-like creature. Don't be fooled by his high voice though, he is sure to leave you scratching your head by telling you what you want to hear but never following through on a promise.


Myewzeke's vocal cords have been artificially replaced with a synthesizer. He speaks like a vocoder sounds, and his harmony and pitch follow a natural expression of emotion in his phrases. A musical entity for sure, but is driven by a desire to be heard and understood.


Bux is super cute and playful, but he's greedy and at the very least is transparent about that. Bux is small in stature but big in his presence and has a lot of influence in his social circles.


Spirow is ethereal, elusive, and shadowy. In most environments, you can't see anything other than his eyes and what they illuminate. His voice has a built-in echo chamber and is the sonic equivalent of a shadow. Spirow's voice is a wonderful option for your most mysterious characters.


Brone is a tall, thin brute with unparalleled strength especially for his deceptive human-like complexion. His deep, strong voice is commanding, fearsome and at times overbearing: your first instinct is to curl up in the corner and get away from the oppression. To make matters worse, Brone is psychopathic and will do anything in his power to dominate his opponent or anyone that gets in his way.


About the Phrases:


Audio files in this package range from simple, common responses and a variety of numbers, to grunts, growls and other emotion-filled babbling. Each creature contains 202 unique audio files (or phrases/utterances), for a total of 1212 (the phrases/utterances below are the same for each character). See below for full list of all phrases for each creature. Don't see a phrase that you need? Reach out to Matt at 4chambersound@gmail.com for custom audio

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 1212

Number of Audio Cues: 1212

Sample rate / bit rate: 48kHz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 54m 17s

Supported Development Platforms:

Mac: Yes
